name: Pyro Jump Rescue
description:
Pyro Jump Rescue is a (new and) fun one of those jump from one spinning wheel to the other games — TouchArcade

Pyro Jump is back and this time he's not alone! Once again, he's going to need your talents to save his friends who are being held prisoner.
On the strength of the success of Pyro Jump first game (more than 5 million downloads), Pyro, the little flame, is back and is stronger than ever! The challenge is still there, with a new fortresses game system. Unlock the levels one after the other, save your friends and reach unexplored heights.

Pyro Jump Rescue is a an awesome beautiful platform game that requires speed, skill, precision and a sense of timing. Challenge your friends and don't let Pyro's love go out!

Who will be the first to free his friends?

Available on iPhone, iPad!
____________________________________________________________________

Pyro Jump Rescue's features

• Easy to play and progressive difficulty
• 9 complete levels of surprises
• Fiery graphics! (HD Retina)
• Store available to take advantage of some incredible improvements
• New levels coming soon
• Compatible iPhone 4s and over, iPad 2 and over
